headline: Three Mining Stocks To Buy As Silver Hits All-Time High
summary: On Tuesday, silver prices pushed past $60 per ounce to set an all-time record. Silver reached that unprecedented price after a roughly 5% rally on Tuesday. It has been an exceptional year for silver, which generally tends to be a volatile metal. Year-to-date silver is up 104%. Much of the demand has been driven by its use in industrial settings,...

headline: December FOMC Preview: Rate Cut Priced in but Tone is Everything
summary: On Wednesday, the Federal Reserve will take center stage. With a rate cut widely expected, the real story will be expectations for 2026 and how the Fed balances softening employment data with ongoing economic strength.

headline: BofA Raises PT on Newmont (NEM) Stock
summary: Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) is one of the Most Undervalued Stocks to Buy Right Now. headline: BNP Paribas Exane Downgrades Newmont Corporation (NEM) to Neutral from Outperform
summary: Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) is one of the best copper stocks to buy right now. Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) was downgraded by BNP Paribas Exane to Neutral from Outperform on December 5, with the firm setting a price target of $97 and telling investors that the copper sector is entering 2026 with momentum, making it more constructive […]
